trigger.name: CPU USAGE {$SNMPVALUE} is HIGH
trigger.description: Trigger for CPU USAGE higher than 80%

item.name: Number of network interfaces
item.description: The number of network interfaces (regardless of their current state) present on this system.

item_prototype.name: Contagem de falhas de aloca√ß√£o de mem√≥ria

discovery_rule.name: Network interfaces
discovery_rule.description:
You may also consider using IF-MIB::ifType or IF-MIB::ifAlias for discovery depending on your filtering needs.
{$SNMP_COMMUNITY} is a global macro.

item_prototype.name: Admin status of interface $1
item_prototype.description: The desired state of the interface.

item_prototype.name: Description of interface $1
item_prototype.description: A textual string containing information about the interface. This string should include the name of the manufacturer, the product name and the version of the interface hardware/software.

item_prototype.name: Incoming traffic on interface $1
item_prototype.description: The number of octets in valid MAC frames received on this interface, including the MAC header and FCS.

item_prototype.name: Outgoing traffic on interface $1
item_prototype.description: The number of octets transmitted in MAC frames on this interface, including the MAC header and FCS.

item_prototype.name: Inbound errors on interface $1
item_prototype.description: For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of inbound packets that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. For character-oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the number of inbound transmission units that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol.

item_prototype.name: Operational status of interface $1
item_prototype.description: The current operational state of the interface.

trigger_prototype.name: Status Operacional foi alterado no {HOST.NAME} interface {#SNMPVALUE}

item_prototype.name: Outbound errors on interface $1
item_prototype.description: For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of outbound packets that could not be transmitted because of errors. For character-oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the number of outbound transmission units that could not be transmitted because of errors.

trigger_prototype.name: Status Operacional foi alterado no {HOST.NAME} interface {#SNMPVALUE}

item.name: Total de Routas IPv4 na FIB
Total de Routas IPv4 na RIB
Total de Routas IPv6 na FIB

item_prototype.name: Total de rotas recebidas com peer {#BGPPEER} - AS{#ASNUM}
Status operacional para o peer {#BGPPEER} - AS{#ASNUM}

template.template: RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos
template.name: RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos

discovery_rule.name: Network Optical Modules Info
discovery_rule.description: Discovering interfaces from IF-MIB. Interfaces with down(2) Administrative Status are not discovered.

trigger_prototype.expression: ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>{RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalRxHighWarnThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<={RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalRxHighThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalRxHighWarnThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} <> -0.01)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Rx Power Alto

trigger_prototype.expression: ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<{RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalRxLowWarnThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>={RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalRxLowThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalRxLowWarnThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} <> -0.01)and ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}> -40)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Rx Power Baixo

trigger_prototype.expression: ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>{RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalRxHighThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalRxHighThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} <> -0.01)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Rx Power Muito Alto

trigger_prototype.expression: ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<{RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalRxLowThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and {RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalRxLowThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} <> -0.01 and ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}> -40)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Rx Power Muito Baixo

trigger_prototype.expression: ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>{RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalTxHighWarnThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>{RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalTxHighThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalTxHighWarnThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} <> -0.01)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Tx Power Alto

trigger_prototype.expression: ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<{RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalTxLowWarnThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<{RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalTxLowThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalTxLowWarnThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} <> -0.01) and ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}> -40)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Tx Power Baixo

trigger_prototype.expression: ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>{RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalTxHighThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and {RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalTxHighThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} <> -0.01
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Tx Power Muito Alto

trigger_prototype.expression: ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<{RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalTxLowThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and {RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalTxLowThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} <> -0.01 and ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes sobre Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}> -40)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Tx Power Muito Baixo

item_prototype.name: Tr√°fego de sa√≠da $1 - {#IFALIAS}

item_prototype.description: For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of inbound packets that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. For character-oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the number of inbound transmission units that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol.

item_prototype.name: Erros de sa√≠da $1 - {#IFALIAS}
